skill.name: orchestrator-agent
skill.description: Master coordinator for Unite-Hub workflows. Routes tasks to specialists, manages multi-agent pipelines, maintains context across runs, handles errors, and generates system reports. The brain of the automation system.
skill.summary: Master coordinator for Unite-Hub workflows. Routes tasks to specialists, manages multi-agent pipelin...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure markdown documentation file describing workflow orchestration patterns. Contains no executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access. Safe for distribution.

content.value_statement: Managing separate AI agents creates coordination chaos. The Orchestrator Agent serves as the command center that routes tasks to specialists, maintains state across runs, and provides unified system reporting.
actual_capabilities: Routes tasks through Truth Layer validation before execution
Maintains persistent memory for workflow state across runs
Generates comprehensive system health and performance reports
Handles errors at three levels: recoverable, significant, and critical
Creates audit trails for all automated actions
limitations: Requires other specialist agents (email-agent, content-agent) to function
Designed specifically for Unite-Hub platform integration
Cannot operate without database connectivity to Convex
Does not execute actions outside defined workflow patterns

use_cases.title: Automated Lead Nurturing
use_cases.description: Process incoming emails, score leads, and generate personalized follow-up content automatically.

use_cases.title: Content Approval Pipeline
use_cases.description: Review and approve generated content drafts while maintaining compliance audit trails.

use_cases.title: System Health Monitoring
use_cases.description: Run comprehensive audits of data integrity, agent performance, and system status.

prompt_templates.title: Full Pipeline Run
prompt_templates.prompt: Run full workflow: process emails and generate follow-up content for warm leads

prompt_templates.title: Check Status
prompt_templates.prompt: What's the status of pending content drafts and their priority scores

prompt_templates.title: System Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run system audit and generate health report for all agents and databases

prompt_templates.title: Approve Content
prompt_templates.prompt: Approve all content drafts for contacts John and Lisa and update their follow-up schedules

output_examples.input: Run full workflow: process emails and generate follow-up content for warm leads
output: Next Actions: Review and approve 8 pending drafts

best_practices: Start with system audit to verify health before running complex workflows
Use Truth Layer validation to identify blockers before workflow execution
Review generated reports to understand system capacity and next actions
Leverage persistent memory to maintain context across multiple workflow runs
anti_patterns: Running full pipelines without first checking system health status
Ignoring Truth Layer validation warnings about build or test failures
Approving content without verifying contact readiness and recency
Skipping audit review after automated workflows complete

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude and Claude Code. Codex compatibility has not been tested.

faq.question: What are the processing limits?
faq.answer: The orchestrator can handle batches of 100 contacts and 50 emails per workflow run. Larger datasets process in multiple batches.

faq.question: How does it integrate with other tools?
faq.answer: The orchestrator coordinates specialist agents like email-agent and content-agent. Integration requires Convex database connectivity.

faq.question: Is data stored securely?
faq.answer: All workflow state and memory persists in the aiMemory table. Audit logs track every action for compliance and transparency.

faq.question: Why did my workflow stop?
faq.answer: Check the audit logs for error details. Level 3 critical errors halt workflows immediately. Level 1-2 errors allow continuation with logging.

faq.question: How does this compare to other orchestration tools?
faq.answer: Unlike generic workflow tools, this orchestrator uses a Truth Layer validation approach that prevents tasks from starting when blockers exist.
